title: They were high-income people in the United States. A 70% tax in 1980?
subtitle: The question was raised in the light of a proposal by United States Congresswoman Alexandria Ocacio-Cortez to impose a tax of 70 per cent on those workers.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The marginal tax rate for individuals or high-paid families in 1980 was 70 per cent.
